title: What is wrong with these ban rates?
body:
Yasuo- 53%
Zed- 42%
Darius- 40%
Katarina- 36%
Camille- 33%

Nothing is wrong. These ban rates show nothing at all. That is what Riot has us believe.  

Yeah, right.  /trollface

replies.body:
People ban Yasuo and Zed regardless.

Zed because people are always scared of Zed no matter how bad or good he is, and Yasuo cause hes irritating as f to play against.

> [{quoted}](name=kidsruinlol,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hEeeF6Z6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-02T10:00:06.396+0000)
>
> People ban Yasuo and Zed regardless.
> 
> Zed because people are always scared of Zed no matter how bad or good he is, and Yasuo cause hes irritating as f to play against.

That is fine. Except there is a game mode from which u can't do bans. That folks want to indulge in mindlessly playing the game sometimes.

Ok. Here's why I ban those champions:

**Yasuo**: Bullshit kit you have to play against (and idiots constantly spamming their easy af to get mastery 7 icon)
**Zed**: Don't want to see him for a game (he's actually nice to play against)
**Darius**: I don't ban Darius
**Katarina**: I don't ban Katarina
**Camille**: Can't be arsed to play around her bullshit ult.

They show frustration level and snowball potential, not necessarily balance. I certainly don't consider Yasuo OP. In fact, I don't consider any of those champions OP. My bans would be Shaco, Ivern and Graves if I had to choose.

> [{quoted}](name=zecastar,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=hEeeF6Z6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-02T10:06:50.668+0000)
>
> They show frustration level and snowball potential, not necessarily balance. I certainly don't consider Yasuo OP. In fact, I don't consider any of those champions OP. My bans would be Shaco, Ivern and Graves if I had to choose.

Don't u think there's a reason for that frustration? And that it should be addressed? 

Do u know what is the average ban rate across the board when u exclude these champions?

If I was Riot, these are the champions I would nerf into the ground and then access what changes it brought to the game.

Yes, I'm a simple man. I'm not a Math man or some Statistics guy. I stare at some Statistics in the face and can only come up with the most simple solution that appeals to my common sense. That is what I am- A simple man with simple solutions.

> Don't u think there's a reason for that frustration? And that it should be addressed?

I mean, we DO. 

But the problem is those champion mains or Bronze players who thinks they're a "Know-It-All" jumping in to defend on whatever toxic crap they had to spew out.

> 
> But the problem is those champion mains or Bronze players who thinks they're a "Know-It-All" jumping in to defend on whatever toxic crap they had to spew out.

The casual and Bronze players are the the majority of Riot's customer base. Pro players who think they are privy to some special wisdom or knowledge that the majority do not possess- Would it be possible that it's simply because they lack the empathy to think in the shoes of the common player?
